Hall/NBCU/Getty Images by WARNER TODD HUSTON | 31Ang 2018 Vanessa Marquez, an actress, perhaps best known as a featured nurse on the 199os TV show ER, was shot and killed Thursday by police in Los Angeles after she pointed what turned out to be a BB gun at them during an encounter.
